Tā xià gè yuè qù Měiguó chūchāi.
He’s going to the USA on a business trip next month.

我想去中国学中文。: 我有一个朋友在德国工作。
Wǒ yǒu yí gè péngyou zài Déguó gōngzuò.
I have a friend who works in Germany.

我想去中国学中文。: 日本的饭店很多，我们可以去看看。
Rìběn de fàndiàn hěn duō, wǒmen kěyǐ qù kànkan.
There are many restaurants in Japan; we can go take a look.

Yàzhōu hěn dà, yǒu hěn duō guójiā.
Asia is big and has many countries.

我想去中国学中文。: 我住在欧洲，但是想去亚洲旅行。
Wǒ zhù zài Ōuzhōu, dànshì xiǎng qù Yàzhōu lǚxíng.
I live in Europe, but I want to travel to Asia.

Fēizhōu yě yǒu hěn duō dà chéngshì.
Africa also has many big cities.

我想去中国学中文。: 我第一次去美洲，有点紧张。
Wǒ dì yī cì qù Měizhōu, yǒudiǎn jǐnzhāng.
It’s my first time going to the Americas; I’m a bit nervous.

Yàzhōu shì yí gè dà zhōu.

我想去中国学中文。: 从苏黎世到巴塞尔不太远。
Cóng Sūlìshì dào Bāsài’ěr bù tài yuǎn.
From Zurich to Basel isn’t very far.
